text.author: Steny Hoyer
text.title: AMERICANS WILL JUDGE
text.summary: In a speech in the US Congress, a Democratic member of Congress accuses Republican Senators of failing to fulfill their oath to conduct an impartial trial in the impeachment of President Donald Trump for abuse of power and attempts to solicit foreign interference in the 2020 elections.
